name: Battle Cannons
description:
====== Controls for Battle Cannons ======
Move: A/D or LEFT/RIGHT
Aim: W/S or UP/DOWN
Shoot: Space
Change weapon: F or Right Click
Change power: X/C

====== Gameplay Instructions ======
Two players are each given a tank.
The goal of the game is to kill
the opposing player with the
weapons available to them.
